overview: Alison's in the bedroom with the houseboy, Ted's in the guestroom with a friend. Ted's partner's in the kitchen with the cook, the servants in the spa are on a bend. They're waiting patiently for Ted's young Chris, back from college with a financ√©, yet. Her arrival is not just what they'd pictured, but it's guaranteed to make you viewers wet!  Yes, they're at it again!
tagline: Yes, the rich do it differently! ...Better? ...Nastier?
title: Sins of the Wealthy 2
